item.description:
Hello all!

As a result of the poll, this month's Meetup will be held at Best Friends in Boxford, MA. Please note that I have changed the time because the room is not available in the morning. We have it from 1pm until 4pm. Please update your RSVP if this changes your plans to attend. I apologize if this causes any inconvenience.

At the same time as our Meetup, Best Friends is holding an Adopt-A-Thon at this location. The adopt-a-thon will be held outside, but I just wanted to mention it so if anyone is interested in adopting, or knows someone who is, you can check it out!

Also, FYI... I will be scheduling next month's meetup to be held at the location with the second number of votes, Bradley Palmer State Park in Topsfield, MA.

Thanks!
-laura

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel May Meeting
